seeFretboard.Designs.CirlceNote module¶

class seeFretboard.Designs.CirlceNote.CircleNote(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

CircleNote is a class for displaying notes with customizable properties.

- noteFaceColor

The color of the note face. Default is ‘blue’.

Type:

str

- noteFill

Indicates whether the note should be filled. Default is True.

Type:

bool

- noteEdgeColor

The color of the note edge. Default is ‘black’.

Type:

str

- noteEdgeWidth

The width of the note edge. Default is 2.

Type:

int

- noteRadius

The radius of the note. Default is 0.4.

Type:

float

- noteOpacity

The opacity of the note. Default is 1.

Type:

float

- noteTextColor

The color of the text inside note.

Type:

str

- noteTextFont

The font of the text inside note.

Type:

str

- intervals

List of intervals associated with the note.

Type:

list

- scaleDegrees

List of scale degrees associated with the note.

Type:

list

- name

The name of the note.

Type:

str

- nameWithOctave

The name of the note with octave information.

Type:

str

- fret

The fret position of the note.

Type:

int

- string

The string position of the note.

Type:

int

seeFretboard.Designs.FretboardFigure module¶

class seeFretboard.Designs.FretboardFigure.FretboardFigure(note, theme, orientation='h', width=None, height=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

The FretboardFigure class is responsible for creating a Bokeh figure object that represents a guitar fretboard. It allows for customization of the figure’s orientation, size, and range, as well as the addition of string and fret labels. The class also includes methods for switching the orientation of the figure and getting/setting the x and y ranges.

- fig

The Bokeh figure object.

Type:

figure

- figHorXRange

The x-range for the horizontal orientation.

Type:

Range1d

- figHorYRange

The y-range for the horizontal orientation.

Type:

Range1d

- figVerXRange

The x-range for the vertical orientation.

Type:

Range1d

- figVerYRange

The y-range for the vertical orientation.

Type:

Range1d

- orientation

The orientation of the fretboard figure (‘h’ for horizontal, ‘v’ for vertical).

Type:

str

- stringLabel

The string label layout.

Type:

str

- fretLabel

The fret label layout.

Type:

str

- width

The width of the figure.

Type:

int

- height

The height of the figure.

Type:

int

Adds the fret label layout to the figure.

Adds the string label layout to the figure.
